comment.body:
@BlazDT Hi, looks like it's caused by the rule

```adblock
amazon.*###search .s-main-slot > div.s-result-item[data-asin=""]:not(.a-section) .s-progressive-scroll-container span[data-action="s-progressive-scroll-link"]
```

in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/5c8cfe8154cf13600ad5a611715115c925ecfe76 .

Do you remember which case this rule is targeting to?

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

comment.body:
Naprawione w https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/c2ecaca1f050cf8caa7b4fc82136312b7904d219
Niestety ze względu na politykę Google, rozszerzenie oparte o MV3 nie może aktualizować filtrów, więc nowe reguły będą dostępne dopiero w jednej z kolejnych aktualizacji rozszerzenia.
Do tego czasu możesz dodać poniższą regułę do reguł użytkownika:
```adblock
open.fm,deliciousmagazine.pl,poczta.wp.pl,pilot.wp.pl,polygamia.pl,abczdrowie.pl,money.pl,www.dobreprogramy.pl,o2.pl,gadzetomania.pl,komorkomania.pl,autocentrum.pl,pudelek.pl,vpolshchi.pl,parenting.pl,autokult.pl,fotoblogia.pl,dom.wp.pl,pogoda.wp.pl,gry.wp.pl,wroclaw.wp.pl,moto.wp.pl,wideo.wp.pl,kuchnia.wp.pl,facet.wp.pl,sportowefakty.wp.pl,turystyka.wp.pl,magazyn.wp.pl,kobieta.wp.pl,ksiazki.wp.pl,tech.wp.pl,opinie.wp.pl,teleshow.wp.pl,gwiazdy.wp.pl,film.wp.pl,wiadomosci.wp.pl,finanse.wp.pl#%#//scriptlet('trusted-create-element', 'head', 'script', '', '(()=>{try{document.currentScript.remove(),Object.defineProperty=new Proxy(Object.defineProperty,{apply:(e,t,n)=>{const r=new Set(["VP","w3","JW"]),o=n[1],c=n[2]?.get;return o&&r.has(o)&&"function"==typeof c&&/^\(\)=>.$/.test(c.toString())&&(n[2].get=function(){return function(){return!1}}),Reflect.apply(e,t,n)}})}catch(e){}})();')
```

comment.body:
Naprawione w https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/c2ecaca1f050cf8caa7b4fc82136312b7904d219
Niestety ze względu na politykę Google, rozszerzenie oparte o MV3 nie może aktualizować filtrów, więc nowe reguły będą dostępne dopiero w jednej z kolejnych aktualizacji rozszerzenia.
Do tego czasu możesz dodać poniższą regułę do reguł użytkownika:
```adblock
open.fm,deliciousmagazine.pl,poczta.wp.pl,pilot.wp.pl,polygamia.pl,abczdrowie.pl,money.pl,www.dobreprogramy.pl,o2.pl,gadzetomania.pl,komorkomania.pl,autocentrum.pl,pudelek.pl,vpolshchi.pl,parenting.pl,autokult.pl,fotoblogia.pl,dom.wp.pl,pogoda.wp.pl,gry.wp.pl,wroclaw.wp.pl,moto.wp.pl,wideo.wp.pl,kuchnia.wp.pl,facet.wp.pl,sportowefakty.wp.pl,turystyka.wp.pl,magazyn.wp.pl,kobieta.wp.pl,ksiazki.wp.pl,tech.wp.pl,opinie.wp.pl,teleshow.wp.pl,gwiazdy.wp.pl,film.wp.pl,wiadomosci.wp.pl,finanse.wp.pl#%#//scriptlet('trusted-create-element', 'head', 'script', '', '(()=>{try{document.currentScript.remove(),Object.defineProperty=new Proxy(Object.defineProperty,{apply:(e,t,n)=>{const r=new Set(["VP","w3","JW"]),o=n[1],c=n[2]?.get;return o&&r.has(o)&&"function"==typeof c&&/^\(\)=>.$/.test(c.toString())&&(n[2].get=function(){return function(){return!1}}),Reflect.apply(e,t,n)}})}catch(e){}})();')
```

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

comment.body:
Or install MV2 extension.

1. https://www.autocontrol.app/force-enable-Manifest-V2-support
    - Download ***Force Manifest V2 availability.reg*** to your computer.
    - Double-click on the file and confirm the message box.
    
    This action could be reverted by ***Remove Manifest V2 availability.reg*** + steps ***2***, ***3***.
    
2. Go to `chrome://policy` and click on the ***Reload** policies* button.
3. Go to `chrome://flags/`
    - Switch ***Allow legacy extension manifest versions*** to ***Enabled***
    - Maybe ***Temporarily unexpire * flags*** also required.
    - Restart the browser.
4. Run browser with shortcut parameter (add to ***Target*** field in details)
`-disable-features=ExtensionManifestV2Unsupported,ExtensionManifestV2Disabled`

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://app.titan.email/login/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.titan.email%2Flogin%2F) ### Comment ``` Email login is not possible because AdGuard Home DNS is blocking it. When I deactivate AdGuard DNS, I am able to log in successfully. According to the logs, the following URL was being blocked: api.flockmail.com. comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
AdGuard Extra runs only on specific websites, and it should not run on `marca.com` and `dailymotion.com` (video player is from `dailymotion.com`).
By the way, I see in the report that AdGuard Extra is added as a custom filter lists.
If it's not a bug from reporting tool, then please remove it from custom filters, it's supposed to be used only as a userscript and it should not be used as a filter list.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973
